name: Pre-check equipment for damage prior to installation
Check-off Shop Drawings. Is it all installed correctly: i.e.., each run complete.
U/S of duct heights correct as per Workshop Drawings.
Duct Hangers (is spacing correct, installed level , rods trimmed back etc)
Duct jointing (Joints sealed, cleats fitted etc)
Orientation of dampers and equipment to be installed correct way
Access panels at low points of ducts
No metallic ducts have taped joints
All volume control dampers set fully open.
Seismic bracing installed as per Drawing
Flexible duct exceeding 1.5m in length to be supported in the centre using flexible duct supports & nylon banding. Flexibles not to exceed 3m Total length
Correct Equipment / Correct Grills / Diffuser Installed
Flexible connection fixed correctly to grill box
